comments.body:
fuzzing isn't typically concerned with validation rules, just with fields that are assigned defaults if nil, so:

```
if obj.TimeoutSeconds == nil {
  i := int32(30)
  obj.TimeoutSeconds = &i
}
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@			obj.FailurePolicy = &p
			s := admissionregistration.SideEffectClassUnknown
			obj.SideEffects = &s
			if obj.TimeoutSeconds == nil {
				i := int32(30)
